text: 4. Development proposals adjacent to safeguarded wharves, rail depots and bus depots are required to ensure they do not compromise their operation in line with the ‘Agent of Change’ principle. 5. Development proposals that provide new or improved wharves or other facilities for freight transfer between road, rail or water will be supported where they: a. minimise impacts on the environment and neighbouring amenities; b. support modal shift; and c. facilitate the use of zero or low emissions vehicles. 364 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Supporting text
